messages.title: The guy who left 'Gogglebox' for UKIP
messages.content: East Sussex born and bred and have lived here all my life.

messages.title: UKIP's POLITICAL PRIORITIES
messages.content:
We want to see far more small businesses freed from regulation and removed from paying business rates and VAT
We want to see greater investment in education, increasing opportunities for all children, with no University tuition fees for science students

messages.title: Believe in Britain, Believe in Me
messages.content:
Leave the EU saving 30 Million a day
Control our borders with responsible immigration
Get our powers back from Brussels & become a strong independent country again

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To significantly increase the number of GPs and Community Nurses in this constituency.
To attract investment into the area by offering concessions to firms investing in the deprived wards of the constituency and affordable housing for all.
To support the Hastings fishermen to get a fairer quota and earn a decent wage, protecting the largest beach-launched fishing fleet in the UK.

issues.brexitEurope:
Leave the EU saving 30 Million a day
Get our powers back from Brussels & become a strong independent country again
issues.economy: To attract investment into the area by offering concessions to firms investing in the deprived wards of the constituency and affordable housing for all.
issues.education: We want to see greater investment in education, increasing opportunities for all children, with no University tuition fees for science students
issues.health: To significantly increase the number of GPs and Community Nurses in this constituency.
issues.immigration: Control our borders with responsible immigration

housing.content: To attract investment into the area by offering concessions to firms investing in the deprived wards of the constituency and affordable housing for all.

leaflet.personalStatement:
I went to a state secondary modern school & a state technical college
I have been married for 28 years, have four grown up children, and I believe in family values
I promise the people of Hastings, Rye and the villages of this constituency, that I will work tirelessly for their interests at all times

images.caption: Michael was picking up flotsam in Norman Road St. Leonards earlier. Bikes were leaning out of the skip. 23/3/2015
